snippet.title: Cataclysm Classic Announce Trailer | World of Warcraft
snippet.description:
Witness the world-shattering destruction wrought by Deathwing in the Cataclysm Classic Announce Trailer, directed and produced by Hurricane and his team. As the Destroyer bursts from the heart of the Maelstrom, all of Azeroth burns beneath the shadow of his wings. 

Prepare to experience a new age of Cataclysm in 2024. 

Get the Blazing Epic Upgrade for Cataclysm Classic today: https://shop.battle.net/product/world-of-warcraft-cataclysm-classic-upgrades?utm_source=youtube.com&utm_campaign=mktg-wow-global-cata-classic-prepurchase&utm_medium=video&utm_content=yt_video

► Visit Hurricane’s channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/Hurricane046 
► Latest WoW news: http://worldofwarcraft.com/news 
► Subscribe to WoW: http://blizz.ly/WoWYTSub
► Visit WoW on Battle.net: https://shop.battle.net/family/world-of-warcraft 
--
► Follow Warcraft on Twitter: https://twitter.com/warcraft 
► Follow Warcraft on Instagram: https://instagram.com/warcraft 
► Like Warcraft on Facebook: https://facebook.com/warcraft
